Store

Thank you for your interest in Mylavarapu Srinivasa Rao books. We want on-line shopping of his books to be convenient, safe and secure. The books have been made into categories: “Individual books” and “CDs“.

Ordering books is as simple as 1-2-3-4.

  1. Click/tap on the category to view the books and CD.
  2. Then, click/tap “Buy Now” to add books into the Shopping Bag.
  3. When you are done with shopping, click “Open Bag”, review the order (quantity, price etc) and click/tap “Checkout”.
  4. Enter shipping and contact details to place order. You can also Sign-In and create an account with these details. It saves lots of time and errors for future Checkouts. You can track your order too, when you sign-in.

We support Cash on Delivery (CoD or VPP, as it is widely known) – you pay only when you get.

The store is closed for maintenance
